item.title: LVM (Logical Volume Management) – Combine Physical Drives and more!
item.author: contact@christitus.com (Chris Titus)
item.description: LVM is a very cool volume management tool. It can be used for a variety of tasks and this guide explains all the things LVM can do. I also do an example video of combining physical hard drives using LVM.
item.dc:creator: Chris Titus

item.title: Resize LVM Partition | Fedora 29 | Step by Step Guide
item.author: contact@christitus.com (Chris Titus)
item.description: In this guide, I show you how to Resize LVM Partition in Fedora 29. I recently ran out of space and had to clone my install from a 120SSD ssd to a 240 GB SSD.
item.dc:creator: Chris Titus
